mapper.select: SELECT o.order_idx AS 주문_고유번호 ,o.order_number AS 발주번호 ,o.supplier_idx AS 공급업체_고유번호 ,o.emp_idx AS 발주요청자_고유번호 ,o.order_date AS 발주일 ,o.status AS 발주상태 ,o.expected_arrival_date AS 예상입고일 ,o.note AS 비고 ,o.created_at AS 생성일시 ,o.updated_at AS 수정일시 ,i.order_item_idx AS 발주상세_고유번호 ,i.order_idx AS 발주_고유번호 ,i.product_idx AS 상품_고유번호 ,i.quantity AS 발주수량 ,i.unit_price AS 단가 ,i.total_price AS 총액 FROM PURCHASE_ORDER o LEFT JOIN PURCHASE_ORDER_ITEM i ON o.order_idx = i.order_idx ORDER BY o.order_date DESC

SELECT o.order_idx AS 주문_고유번호 ,o.order_number AS 발주번호 ,o.supplier_idx AS 공급업체_고유번호 ,o.emp_idx AS 발주요청자_고유번호 ,o.order_date AS 발주일 ,o.status AS 발주상태 ,o.expected_arrival_date AS 예상입고일 ,o.note AS 비고 ,o.created_at AS 생성일시 ,o.updated_at AS 수정일시 ,i.order_item_idx AS 발주상세_고유번호 ,i.order_idx AS 발주_고유번호 ,i.product_idx AS 상품_고유번호 ,i.quantity AS 발주수량 ,i.unit_price AS 단가 ,i.total_price AS 총액 FROM PURCHASE_ORDER o LEFT JOIN PURCHASE_ORDER_ITEM i ON o.order_idx = i.order_idx WHERE o.order_idx = #{orderIdx} ORDER BY o.order_date DESC
SELECT order_number FROM PURCHASE_ORDER WHERE DATE(created_at) = CURDATE() ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1;
